Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
firerate=7 power=50 floats=true rate=1/30
debris=game:GetService("Debris") equipped=false check=true
function waitfor(parent,name) while parent:FindFirstChild(name)==nil do wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
handle=waitfor(sp,"Handle")
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse~=nil then equipped=true mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local hu=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if check and hu and hu.Health>0 and t then check=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" local sound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("Sound") if sound~=nil then sound:Play() end local shoulder=t:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") if shoulder~=nil then shoulder.CurrentAngle=2 end local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="Effect" p.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Medium stone grey") p.CanCollide=false p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.Shape="Ball" p.formFactor="Symmetric" p.Size=Vector3.new(1,1,1) local vec=(mouse.Hit.p-handle.Position).unit p.CFrame=CFrame.new(handle.Position,handle.Position+vec)*CFrame.new(0,0,-2) p.Velocity=(vec*power)+Vector3.new(0,power*.15,0)
local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88545836" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88545941" m.Scale=Vector3.new(2.5,2.5,2.5) m.Parent=p
local f=Instance.new("Fire") f.Color=Color3.new(1,1,1) f.SecondaryColor=Color3.new(0,0,0) f.Heat=2 f.Size=3 f.Parent=p
local c=Instance.new("ObjectValue") c.Name="creator" c.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer c.Parent=p
local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=p s.Disabled=false
if floats then local bf=Instance.new("BodyForce") bf.force=Vector3.new(0,196.2*p:GetMass(),0) bf.Parent=p p.Velocity=(vec*power) end
debris:AddItem(p,30) p.Parent=game.Workspace wait(firerate) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" check=true end end) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
damage=100 rate=1/30
function waitfor(a,b) while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil do a.ChildAdded:wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end
local ct=waitfor(sp,"creator") local debris=game:GetService("Debris") check=false
sp.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit~=nil and sp~=nil and (not check) then if ct.Value~=nil and ct.Value.Character~=nil then if hit.Parent~=ct.Value.Character and hit.Name~="Handle" and hit.Name~="Effect" and hit.Name~="Handle2" and hit.Parent.Name~="Ghost" then check=true local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if h~=nil and t~=nil and h.Health>0 then for i,v in ipairs(h:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end if ct~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(h:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local clonect=ct:clone() debris:AddItem(clonect,1) clonect.Parent=h end h:TakeDamage(damage) if h.Health<=0 then
local ghost=game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(94251705):GetChildren()[1] --local ghost=game.Lighting.Ghost:clone() if ct~=nil then local clonect=ct:clone() clonect.Parent=ghost end if h~=nil and h.Parent~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(h.Parent:GetChildren()) do if v.className=="CharacterMesh" then local vclone=v:clone() vclone.BaseTextureId=0 vclone.OverlayTextureId=0 vclone.Parent=ghost elseif v.className=="Accoutrement" or v.className=="Hat" then local vclone=v:clone() local hndl=vclone:FindFirstChild("Handle") if hndl~=nil then hndl.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Light stone grey") hndl.Transparency=.5 hndl.Reflectance=0 for i2,v2 in ipairs(hndl:GetChildren()) do if v2.className=="SpecialMesh" then v2.TextureId="" end end end
vclone.Parent=ghost end end end
sp.Transparency=1 sp.Anchored=true local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Transparency=.5 p.Name="Effect" p.formFactor="Custom" p.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Light stone grey") p.Anchored=true p.CanCollide=false p.Size=Vector3.new(.2,.2,.2) p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.CFrame=sp.CFrame local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshType="Sphere" m.Parent=p debris:AddItem(p,4) p.Parent=game.Workspace local frames=.25/rate for frame=1,frames do local percent=frame/frames if m~=nil then m.Scale=Vector3.new(5,5,5)*percent*12 end wait(rate) end local frames=1/rate for frame=1,frames do local percent=frame/frames if m~=nil then m.Scale=Vector3.new(5,5,5)*(.2+((1-percent)*.8))*12 end if p~=nil then p.Transparency=.5-(percent*.25) end wait(rate) end if p~=nil then p:remove() if ct~=nil and sp~=nil then if ct.Value~=nil then if ct.Value.Character~=nil then local t=ct.Value.Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if t~=nil then local fire=sp:FindFirstChild("Fire") if fire~=nil then fire.Color=Color3.new(.5,1,1) end local od=(t.Position-sp.Position).magnitude local frames=1/rate for frame=1,frames do if t~=nil and sp~=nil then local vec=(sp.Position-t.Position).unit sp.CFrame=CFrame.new(t.Position+vec*((1-(frame/frames))*od)) wait(rate) end end if t~=nil and sp~=nil then debris:AddItem(ghost,40) ghost.Parent=game.Workspace ghost:MoveTo(sp.Position) end end end end end end end end if sp and sp~=nil and sp.Parent~=nil then sp:remove() end end end end end)
wait(20) sp:remove()
